Subbed Projects.Show Name: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu Ni!

Good Comments: If you are gonna do subbing, do it complete job by translating those middle parts of japanese texts etc.  Half assed job's bad.
May be later than FFFpeeps routinely due to the amount they are subbing(tho they are with SGKK with this one) but they are good still. I also like FFFpeeps. Both subs are good.
Bad Comments: at least make a tl note saying that himitsu means secret. your main job is to sub, not to make it coherent.
1st week was a little slow, but that was justified. Definitely up there with FFFpeeps for this show.
